lyrics: atitah panthanam tava cha mahima vangmanasayoh
sa kasya stotavyah katividhagunah kasya vishayah
pade tvarvacine patati na manah kasya na vachah
kimadharo dhata srijati kimupadana iti cha
anisho va kuryad bhuvanajanane kah parikaro
paro dhrauvyad hrauvye jagati gadati vyastavishaye
stuvan jihremi tvam na khalu nanu dhrishta mukharata
tavaishvaryam yatnad yad upari virinchir harir adhah
tato bhaktishraddha bharaguru grinadbhya girisha yat
svayam tasthe tabhyam tava kimanuvrittir na phalati
dashasyo yad bahun abhrata ranakandu paravashan
yad riddhim sutramno varada paramochchairapi satim
vidheyasya asid yas trinayana visham samhrutavatah
sa kalmashah kanthe tava na kurute na shriyamaho
vikaropi shlaghyo bhuvana bhaya bhanga vyasaninah
nivartante nityam jagati jayino yasya vishikhah
smarah smartavyatma na hi vashishu pathyah paribhavah
padam vishnor bhramyad bhuja parigha rugna graha ganam
muhurdyaur dausthyam yatyanibhruta jata tadita tata
jagadrakshayai tvam natasi nanu vamaiva vibhuta
viyadvyapi tara gana gunita phenodgama ruchih
pravaho varam yah prushatalaghudrishtah shirasi te
rathange chandrarkau ratha charana pani shar iti
vidheyaih kridantyo na khalu paratantrah prabhudhiyah
kratau supte jagrat tvamasi phalayoge kratumatam
shrutau shraddham badhva dridhaparikarah karmasu janah
rishinam artvijyam sharanada sadasyah sura ganah
dhruvam kartuh shraddha vidhuramabhicharaya hi makhah
gatam rohid bhutam riramayishum rishyasya vapusha
trasantam te adyapi tyajati na mriga vyadharabhasah
purah plushtam drishtva puramathana pushpayudham api
yadi strainam devi yamanirata dehardha ghatamat
avaiti tvam addha bata varada mugdha yuvatayah
prahrishyad romanah pramada salilot sangati drishah
dadhatyantas tattvam kimapi yaminastat kila bhavan
tvam arkas tvam somas tvamasi pavanastvam hutavahah
tvam apastvam vyoma tvamu dharaniratma tvamiti cha
parichinnam evam tvayi parinata bibhrati giram
na vidmastat tattvam vayamiha tu yat tvam na bhavasi
trayim tisro vrttis tribhuvanamatho trinapi suran
akara adyair varnais tribhir abhidadhat tirnavikriti
turiya te dhama dhvanibhir avarundhanam anubhih
samastam vyastam tvam sharanada grunaty om iti padam
namo nedishthaya priyadava davishthaya cha namah
namah kshodishthaya smarahara mahishthaya cha namah
namo varshishthaya trinayana yavishthaya cha namah
namah sarvasmai te tadidamatisarvaya cha namah
prabala-tamase tat sanhare haraya namo namah
pramahasi pade nistraigunye shivaya namo namah
kva cha tava guna-seemollanghini shashvad riddhih
tadapi tava gunanam isha param na yati
pathati parama bhaktya shuddha-chittah puman yah
Aghorannaparo mantro nasti tattvam guroh param
Diksha danam tapastirtham jnanam yagadikah kriyah
Sa khalu nija-mahimno bhashta evasya roshat
Arpita tena deveshah priyatam me sadashivah
Tava tattvam na janami kidrisho'si Maheshwara
Ekakalam dvikalam va trikalam yah pathennarah
॥ Iti Shri Pushpadanta virachitam Shivamahimnah Stotram samaptam ॥
